title: Crash in Love
description: Sameera hates Veer Pratap. The man is arrogant, judgmental and bossy. When Sameera's late father shockingly made Veer the enforcer of her inheritance trust, the arrogant man commanded her to join him on an official trip to Thailand.Sameera prepared herself to resist the strong attraction she always felt towards the jerk. Ten years ago, a beautiful evening spent with him was one of her best memories. But later, she found out the harsh truth, which made her hate him.The official trip was only supposed to be for two days. Until a crash forced her to remain close to her enemy for much longer...Crash in Love is a standalone passionate romance.
author: M.V. Kasi
